reviewText: The figurine isn't really worth it. Though these may be some of the nicer episodes in the series(in spite of filler material) it's only two disks worth of canon.

if anyone wondered what it would look like when the three legendary sanin fight, it involves summoning giant creators. but in the end tsunade overcomes her fear and excepts the roll of fifth hokage. life in the village hidden in the leaves tries to return to normal, naruto and his friends go back to training and missions, why lee makes up his mind to go throw with an operation that could return him to action or to kill him. team 7 is sent to the land of tea to help a friend of lady tsunade in order to win a race that determines who will roll a port city there

One of the best recent anime series allowed in prime time. Begins Naruto's training with Jariah (The Pervy Sage) and the search for Lady Tsunade story arc. Only down side is that these sets are only 3 disc half-seasons rather than full seasons, especially considering the price. That's the only reason I rated it 4 instead of 5.
